title: Regional Health Information Organizations
prompt: A rural county road at golden hour stretching toward distant farmland, with a small clinic or health center visible in the middle distanceâ€”its windows warm with interior light. In the foreground, slightly out of focus, are hands holding a tablet or folder of papers, suggesting the weight of data management and coordination work. The composition emphasizes the isolation and distance between rural care sites, with muted greens and earth tones.
